casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jemal E. BETHEA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 12, 2019

Judie L. Marshall, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Lisa A. Riggione, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 263, 202 A.3d 429 (2019), is denied.
